All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.accessibility.Accessible, pc2.IClient, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, pc2.PC2Remote, java.rmi.Remote, pc2.RemoteObserver, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.swing.WindowConstants
Direct Known Subclasses:
GetRunsClient, JudgeClient, ScoreboardClient, TeamClient
public class BaseClient
extends javax.swing.JFrame
implements pc2.IClient

Base class for Team, Board, Judge PC2 Clients classes.

This class should not be used directly, use the abstract classes that are known subclasses.

Note: BaseClient_Stub is a automatically generated stub for this class.

Most of the functions will throw a RemoteException with title &Not logged into Server& if the connect) or {@link #loginToPC2(String,String,long,String,String) loginToPC2

See Also:
Serialized Form

setLogFilename

public final boolean setLogFilename(java.lang.String newName)
Change default PC2 log file name

this allows the user to redirect the log output to a different file.

Log output is done automatically for certain methods like connect and logout if there are errors/Exceptions.

Returns:
boolean - whether log file name changed or not

changePassword

                                    java.lang.String newPassword)

connect

public boolean connect(java.lang.String IP,
                       java.lang.String Port,
                       long siteId,
                       java.lang.String loginId,
                       java.lang.String password)
                throws java.lang.Exception
Connect to PC2 server

Login/connect to server. Allowed client type are 'team', 'judge', 'board', and 'custom'. LoginId must be prefaced by the client types names.

Any class that extends BaseClient should also use the logoff() method to disconnect from the server.

Parameters:
IP - java.lang.String - IP or hostname
Port - java.lang.String - form digits, default is 1002
siteId - long PC^2 site number, ie 1.
loginId - java.lang.String - PC^2 login account name 'custom1', 'team1', etc.
password - java.lang.String - PC^2 password (cleartext)
Returns:
boolean - true if logged in

getAllClars

public final ClarInfoAndFiles[] getAllClars()
                                     throws ServerAccessException,
                                            java.rmi.RemoteException
Get all clarfications

For team, gets clars for this team (and send to all)
For Judge, gets clars for all teams

getAllRuns

public final RunInfoAndFiles[] getAllRuns()
                                   throws ServerAccessException,
                                          java.rmi.RemoteException
Get all Runs

For Team, only that teams runs
For Judge and Board, returns runs for all teams

todo: Should only allow the users to do this once on startup ??!

getAllUnjudgedRuns

public final RunInfoAndFiles[] getAllUnjudgedRuns()
                                           throws ServerAccessException,
                                                  java.rmi.RemoteException
Get unjudged (non-selected) runs from All Site (Servers) Does not include Files

For Judge, returns all unjudged runs

todo: Should only allow the users to do this once on startup??!

handleSettingsUpdated

public void handleSettingsUpdated()
Indicates when contest settings have changed

When contest settings are changed, this method is called. Contest settings include problem info, language info, account info and other contest settings.

Should be overridden by every Client.

setLogDebugLevel

public final void setLogDebugLevel(int newLevel)
Change default PC2 log debug/verbose level

this allows the user to change the amount of inforation written to log.

Returns:
boolean - whether log file name changed or not

checkOutClar

public final ClarInfoAndFiles checkOutClar(java.lang.Long siteId,
                                           java.lang.Long clarId)
                                    throws java.lang.Exception,
                                           ServerAccessException,
                                           java.rmi.RemoteException
For Judge checks-out a clar

A judge gets an unanswered clar to answer it

Clarification Narative
A team client sends a clarification via submitClarification. The server will then invoke todo:handleNewClar on each Judge and connected server.

A judge answers the clar by checking out the clar using checkOutClar which returns a ClarInfoAndFiles. The server will then send a handleClarSelected to each Judge and server.

The judge who has the clar will then answer the clar by filling in/assigning the setAnswer then invoking the submitAnswer method. The server will send the clar back to the team or team(s) as the judge specified.

If the Judge instead wants to cancel or uncheckout the clar, the judge can invoke the unCheckOutClar and the server will invoke handleNewClar on each judge.

checkOutRun

public final RunInfoAndFiles checkOutRun(java.lang.Long siteId,
                                         java.lang.Long runId)
                                  throws java.lang.Exception,
                                         ServerAccessException,
                                         java.rmi.RemoteException
For Judge, check out/select a run

A judge gets a run, so the run can be judged.

Run Narative

A team client sends a run via submitRun. The server will then invoke handleCheckedOutRun on each Judge and connected server.

A judge judges the run by checking out the clar using checkOutRun (this method) which returns a RunInfoAndFiles. The server will then send a handleCheckedOutRun to each Judge and server.

The judge who has checked out the run, will send back the judgement using the submitJudgement method. The server will send the run judgement back to the team.

If the Judge instead wants to cancel or uncheckout the run, the judge can invoke the unCheckOutRun and the server will invoke handleNewRun on each judge.
